Found on YELP and what a find!!!!   Spent the day walking around all the sites on Montjuic and were starved so finding this place was particularly appropriate to get lots of food.   Well for a bit of a foodie and picky person I was beyond impressed.  Everything was brought out on trays one after the other totally fresh made from the back and beyond delicious.  My husband let me do all the picking and I found three salmon, three vege, three meat and cheese mixtures and two stuffed croquet.  The cava was outstanding and the Volle Damm beer was great too.  We got lucky because we came pretty early so even though it was busy when we got there it slowed down.  By the time we left a couple of hours later it was packed again.   Offered to share our table with two women who turned out to be out for St Gordi day (like Valentine's Day).  Got a great suggestion to go to Sitges.  Going there today!
